trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Decatur
There were no other sightings in Decatur on or around July 16th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsUFO hovering and morphing under dense rain clouds. Disk like, looked as though it was slowly rolling and flipping head over heels. Drifted away until clouds obscured view. Definitely not a bird, plane or helicopter. Had a faint torsion field (for lack of better words) around the object. I was in my backyard looking southeast of Oakhurst, GA. looking up at the beautiful rain clouds when I spotted the object. It caught my eye because it stood out as something obviously anomalous.
